item.description:
John Birch Society coordinator, Hal Shurtleff, will give a presentation on Agenda 21 and the ICLEI, how it influences your community ahd how to stop it. 

  Hal will give a brief history of the United Nations, the parent organization, explain Agenda 21 and how it is being implemented in towns, cities and counties around the U.S., the overall plan of the U.N. and its U.S. advocates, how some communities kicked out the ICLEI and Agenda 21 and how it can be done in your local community.

   There is no charge for the meeting.  You are free to order off the menu,. Donations are accepted
item.how_to_find_us: We will be using the function room
item.name: Agenda 21 and the ICLEI-An Expose
